verbose_text: To test whether TtPAH1 inhibits abnormal nuclear expansion in pah1Delta yeast by inhibiting the phospholipid biosynthesis genes, we have analyzed the mRNA levels of INO1, OPI3 and INO2 by quantitative real-time PCR using Sec 63 (a resident ER membrane protein unaffected by PAH1 deletion) as a control.
evidence: TtPAH1 inhibits abnormal nuclear expansion in pah1Delta yeast by inhibiting the phospholipid biosynthesis
